item.title: OS 11.1
item.description: 11.1 +braun+e225715 qemu-img create -f qcow2 /mnt/ie-virsh/e22/e225715/e225715-02.qcow2 40G Formatting '/mnt/ie-virsh/e22/e225715/e225715-02.qcow2', fmt=qcow2 cluster_size=65536 extended_l2=off compression_type=zlib size=42949672960 lazy_refcounts=off refcount_bits=16 +braun+e225715 ie-virsh define 02 uid: 19832 gid: 1001 name: e225715 generate xml : /etc/libvirt/qemu/e22/e225715/e225715-02.xml vnc password : 2nqip*Xf Domain 'e225715-02' defined from /etc/libvirt/qemu/e22/e225715/e225715-02.xml ## 起動 +braun+e225715 ie-virsh start 02 uid: 19832 gid:
